trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up menu that enables a control to expose functionality that is specific to the context of the control.
trans-unit.target: 表示快顯功能表，讓控制項來公開功能的特定控制項的內容。

trans-unit.source: ContextMenu is an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>, which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl>

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ContextMenu class are used to define the position and behavior of the ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu 類別的屬性用來定義的位置和行為 ContextMenu。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> can have a ContextMenu.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>可以有 ContextMenu。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you assign a ContextMenu to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> class handles context menu operations in response to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指派至 ContextMenu<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>處理內容功能表作業，以回應使用者互動的類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Part of the work the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> does is opening the ContextMenu when the user clicks the right mouse button over the control.
trans-unit.target: 工作的一部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>未當使用者在控制項上按一下滑鼠右鍵開啟 ContextMenu。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: The following properties are defined by the ContextMenu and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> classes.
trans-unit.target: 下列屬性會由 ContextMenu 和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: If any of these properties are set on both ContextMenu and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>, the property value from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果這兩個 ContextMenu 上設定了任何這些屬性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>，屬性值，從<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> A ContextMenu is automatically placed inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A>ContextMenu 自動放在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTargetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 無法變更此行為。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ContextMenu Control To apply the same property settings to multiple ContextMenu controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenu 控制項以自訂適用於多個 ContextMenu 控制項，使用相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the ContextMenu, see [ContextMenu Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和專屬於 ContextMenu 狀態，請參閱[ContextMenu 樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in ContextMenu control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在 ContextMenu 控制項的預設範本，並使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a particular instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> closes.
trans-unit.target: 當特定的執行個體時，就會發生<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>關閉。

trans-unit.source: ## Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Routing strategy|Bubbling| |Delegate||
trans-unit.target: # # 路由事件資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |路由策略 |反昇 | |委派 ||

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback that indicates where a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> should be placed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定回呼，以指出 where <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>應該放在螢幕上。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> for the callback delegate to be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>如要使用的回呼委派。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback> delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>委派會傳回相對於<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>所定義的可能點陣列</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback>

trans-unit.source: When the context menu is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> window that is visible.
trans-unit.target: 點顯示操作功能表時，會選擇，來達到最大數量<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>可見。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The behavior is the same as it is for the popup.
trans-unit.target: 因為它是快顯功能表，則行為是相同。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Specify a Custom Popup Position](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Popup Placement Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to︰ 指定自訂快顯視窗位置](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[快顯功能表放置範例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160032)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A callback that specifies the location of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定之位置的回呼<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.CustomPopupPlacementCallback*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control supports scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否支援捲動。

trans-unit.source: If the control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> in its style and has a custom keyboard scrolling behavior, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> should return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項具有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>及其樣式中且具有捲動行為，自訂鍵盤<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A>應該傳回`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox.HandlesScrolling%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Always <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the context menu appears with a dropped shadow.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已卸除的陰影會顯示內容功能表。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens, the value is set to the value of <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>開啟時，值設定為<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性設定為`true`如果有任何作用<xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是`false`。</xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the context menu appears with a dropped shadow; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 [內容] 功能表隨即出現，並卸除的陰影。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HasDropShadow*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標原點和快顯功能表對齊之間的水平距離的點。

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>, HorizontalOffset, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用放置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A>，HorizontalOffset，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性的行為相同。<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一樣

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯視窗放置行為](../Topic/Popup%20Placement%20Behavior.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None | # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` - or – ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字串表示法值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體的值`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>套用屬性值 > 一節中所述的範圍限制。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值 （如上所述），後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px **Note** In many cases a double may be set to Auto but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> will not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`（預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in`英吋; 1in = = 96px`cm`是公釐。 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`點; 1pt==(96/72) px**注意**在許多情況下 double 值，可能會設定為自動，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>如果位移設定為 auto，將不會出現</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目標原點和快顯對齊點之間的水平距離。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 目標原點，並且快顯對齊點的相關資訊，請參閱[快顯視窗放置行為](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>為可見。

trans-unit.source: When IsOpen is set to `true`, mouse capture is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> and its subtree.
trans-unit.target: 當 IsOpen 設`true`，滑鼠捕捉設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>和其樹狀子結構。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`||
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`||

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref> is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>為可見，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref>就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Closed"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref>這個物件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContextMenuAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Reports that the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*> property changed.
trans-unit.target: 報告<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>屬性已變更。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithin*>

trans-unit.source: The event data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的事件資料<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Placement property of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定放置屬性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>指派給<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>變更此屬性的值時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>隨即開啟。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the mouse, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者開啟的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>位置設定至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>使用滑鼠，</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If the user opens the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by using the keyboard, Placement is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者開啟的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>放置設定至<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode>使用鍵盤</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: If you want to change the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要變更的位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName><xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>屬性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>設定</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: You can position a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>, Placement, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用放置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>，放置， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: These properties behave the same as they do for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性的行為相同。<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>一樣

trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快顯視窗放置行為](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> changes this value of this property to the owning <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> opens.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>指派給<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService>這個此屬性的值變更為擁有<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>隨即開啟。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenu%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.target: 若要使用不同<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>，將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuService.PlacementTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 準備指定的項目，以顯示指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: Preparing the element may involve applying styles, setting bindings, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 準備項目，可能需要套用樣式、 設定繫結，並以此類推。

trans-unit.target: 用來顯示指定的項目項目。

trans-unit.source: Specified item.
trans-unit.target: 指定的項目。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu"></xref>應該自動關閉。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果功能表應該維持開啟直到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>屬性變更為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.IsOpen*>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or – ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value.
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None | # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` - or – ``` # # XAML 值*double* 的字串表示法值。

trans-unit.source: This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 這會解譯為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)]度量。

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For instance, a value of `1` is acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值為`1`是可接受。

trans-unit.source: The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>套用屬性值 > 一節中所述的範圍限制。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* A *double*值 （如上所述），後面接著下列單元宣告字串的其中之一︰ `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > In many cases a double may be set to Auto, but a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu> does not appear if the offsets are set to Auto.
trans-unit.target: `px`（預設值） [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in`英吋; 1in = = 96px`cm`是公釐。 1cm==(96/2.54) px`pt`點; 1pt==(96/72) px > [!NOTE] > 在許多情況下 double 值，可能會設定為自動，但<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>位移設定為 auto 不會顯示</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 目標原點和快顯對齊點之間的垂直距離。

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 目標原點，並且快顯對齊點的相關資訊，請參閱[快顯視窗放置行為](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffset*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
